definition: to roll used in dyeing trough
to crush together (in a crowd)/to make friends/to check (accounts)
to crush/to knock sb down with a vehicle
to dye/to catch (a disease)/to acquire (bad habits etc)/to contaminate/to add color washes to a painting
pressure roller used in dyeing trough

sentences.english: The new development of a padding machine, which is equally suited for the finishing of woven fabrics and knitted goods, is described.
sentences.chinese: 描述了適用於機織物和針織物的軋染機的新發展。
